Package net.derquinse.common.i18n

Interface Summary
Localized<T> Generic interface for localized objects.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLocalized<T> Skeletal implementation for localized objects.
BundleLocalized<T> A localized objects backed by a resource bundle.
ForwardingLocalized<T> An abstract base class for implementing the decorator pattern for localized values.
Locales Utility methods for Locales.
LocalizedBuilder<T> A localized value builder.
LocalizedMessage A localized formatted message.
LocalizedValues Utility methods to build localized values.
Unlocalized<T> Adapter for language-independent or unlocalized values.
 

Exception Summary
UnableToLocalizeException Exception throws when an error localizing and object occurs.
 

Annotation Types Summary
L7d String value localized to one locale annotation.
L7dString Localized string annotation.
